creator: trejkaz@trypticon.org
text:
While processing a large set of documents to extract the properties via HPSF, I
discovered many missing codepages, and thought I would contribute back all the
ones I had to add to get it to work.

Created attachment 18223
Support for extra codepages

Diff of my changes relative to the trunk.
creator: trejkaz@trypticon.org
klute@apache.org
text:
Could you please provide the patch in a proper format, i.e. with slashes instead
of backslashes as path separators? Sure, I could do that myself but I am not
willing to create a precedent.

creator: trejkaz@trypticon.org
text:
Created attachment 18225
Another version, for lazy developers who can't spend five seconds fixing something simple.

Perhaps it's time to cope with the fact that if you're working on Java 
projects, diffs are going to come from any OS which Java can run on.
creator: trejkaz@trypticon.org

text: Tested and integrated into the trunk. Thanks for the patch!
creator: klute@apache.org
